pr_title: Handle 404 responses from get aggregate API

timeline.message: Support custom response handlers in the rest api client

timeline.bodyText: i would have thought putting in SC_NOT_FOUND here as noValueHandler would have been adequate? it'll be a common use case potentially...
timeline.author: rolfyone

replies.bodyText: No that's what we moved away from because it silently ignored the fact that Infura hadn't enabled any of the new APIs.  Most APIs shouldn't return a 404 or should be considered an error worth notifying the user about if they do.
replies.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: ok, every api that returns a single element will be in that list, they all return 404, which is 'correct' behaviour, so the consumers will need to individually decide how to handle whatever they use. that's fine.
replies.author: rolfyone
